properties.areaDesc: Whitfield, GA; Murray, GA; Gordon, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 5:42AM EST until February 10 at 2:53AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Lookout Creek near New England affecting Dade and Hamilton
Counties

South Chickamauga Creek near Ringgold affecting Catoosa County

West Chickamauga Creek near Fort Oglethorpe affecting Catoosa and
Hamilton Counties

Conasauga River near Eton affecting Murray and Whitfield Counties

Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton affecting Whitfield
County

Conasauga River near Tilton affecting Gordon...Murray and
Whitfield Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Conasauga River near Tilton.
* Until late Sunday night.
* At 515 AM Friday the stage was 19.1 feet...and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring and forecast.
* Flood stage is 18 feet.
* The river will continue rising to near 22.8 feet by tomorrow early
afternoon then fall below flood stage Sunday evening.
* At 24 feet...Moderate flooding begins. Significant flooding
expands into the woodlands...fields and pastures along the river
upstream and downstream from the Brackett Ridge Road bridge.
